summary: Gilles' wife, Elise, who smiles when she thinks of him, cooks and scrubs and cheerfully makes love to him, suspects during her third pregnancy that he is having an affair with her ... See full summary »
cast: Emmanuelle Devos|Clovis Cornillac|Laura Smet|Colette Emmanuelle|Gil Lagay|Alice Verlinden|Chloé Verlinden|Yoann Blanc|Philippe Jeusette|Benjamin Ramon|Jean-François Wolff|Patrick Quinet|Geoffrey Magbag|Virginie Saint-Martin|Tim Heep|Loris Mayer|Nemo Gonzalez|Kayla Missavage|Noah Cauchie|Dylan Rua Machado|Loic Martins|Frédéric Fonteyne|Dean Constantin
title: La femme de Gilles
